name: 1UP
description_a: Choose a player. That player gains 1 life. You cannot go above your max life.
description_b:
Play this when any player is reduced to 0 life.
That player returns to 1 life.

name: 1UP
description_a: Choose a player. That player gains 1 life. You cannot go above your max life.
description_b:
Play this when any player is reduced to 0 life.
That player returns to 1 life.

name: BOMB
description_a:
Activate your Spell Card.
You can only activate one Spell Card per round.
description_b:
Play this when another player plays a Danmaku card or activates their Spell Card.

Cancel that card.

name: CAPTURE SPELL CARD
description_a:
Choose another player and activate their character's Spell Card as if it were your own. You may choose a defeated player's character.

You can only activate one Spell Card per ro

name: CAPTURE SPELL CARD

You can only activate one Spell Card per ro

name: FOCUS
description_a:
You have +2 Distance.

You an only activate one Defense card in play at a time.

name: FULL POWER
description_a:
You have +3 Range.

You can play three additional Danmaku cards each round.

Discard 1 Powerup card whenever you lose life to an attack.

name: GHOST LANTERN
description_a:
You cannot lose life this turn.
You may play this at any time.

name: GIFT OF YATAGARASU
description_a:
Choose another player. That player draws three cards.
You may play this at any time.
description_b:
Draw two cards.
You may play this at any time.

name: GIFT OF YATAGARASU
description_a:
Choose another player. That player draws three cards.
You may play this at any time.
description_b:
Draw two cards.
You may play this at any time.

name: HOURAI ELIXIR
description_a:
When you gain control of this card, gain 1 life.

At the beginning of your turn, gain 1 life.

You cannot go above your max life.

name: INTERRUPT
description_a:
Play this when another player plays
an Action card or activates their Spell Card.

Cancel that card or Spell Card.

name: INTERRUPT
description_a:
Play this when another player plays
an Action card or activates their Spell Card.

Cancel that card or Spell Card.

name: JEWELED PAGODA
description_a:
You have +1 Range.

Cards you play and Spell Cards you activate cannot be canceled.

When you are hit by a player’s attack, the attacker gains control of Jeweled Pagoda after all Action and Reaction cards in play are resolved.

name: LASER SHOT
description_a:
Attack a player, regardless of range. This attack cannot be avoided.

By default you can only play one Danmaku card per round.

name: LASER SHOT
description_a:
Attack a player, regardless of range. This attack cannot be avoided.

By default you can only play one Danmaku card per round.

name: MASTER PLAN
description_a:
Resolve the current incident.

Then, look at the top three cards of any deck and place them on the top or bottom of that deck in any order.

name: "OFFERING"
description_a:
Play this only when you could play an Action card, or during any player’s discard step.

Choose a player. That player gains control of an Item card in play of your choice. If this would cause that player to exceed a card limit, you choose which card that player keeps.

name: "OFFERING"
description_a:
Play this only when you could play an Action card, or during any player’s discard step.

Choose a player. That player gains control of an Item card in play of your choice. If this would cause that player to exceed a card limit, you choose which card that player keeps.

name: POINT OF COLLECTION
description_a:
Play this when another player plays
an Action, Reaction, or Invocation card.

Put that card into your hand instead
of the discard pile after it is resolved
or canceled. That card cannot be
collected by incidents.

name: POINT OF COLLECTION
description_a:
Play this when another player plays
an Action, Reaction, or Invocation card.

Put that card into your hand instead
of the discard pile after it is resolved
or canceled. That card cannot be
collected by incidents.

name: PURIFICATION
description_a:
Attack a player in range. This cannot be canceled.

By default you can only play one Danmaku card per round.
description_b: Choose a player. You may force that player to discard an Item card of your choice that player controls.

name: REFLECT SHOT
description_a:
Play this when you are attacked.

You avoid the attack.

Attack the attacker, regardless of range.

This does not count against your Danmaku card limit.

description_a:

Attack the attacker, regardless of range.

This does not count against your Danmaku card limit.

name: REFLECT SHOT
description_a:

Attack the attacker, regardless of range.

name: SCORCHED EARTH
description_a:
Choose a player. You may force that player to discard all Item cards that player controls.

Then, attack that player if they are in range.

By default you can only play one Danmaku card per round.

name: SCORCHED EARTH
description_a:
Choose a player. You may force that player to discard all Item cards that player controls.

Then, attack that player if they are in range.

By default you can only play one Danmaku card per round.

name: SEVEN STAR SWORD
description_a:
Draw an extra card from the Lunatic deck during your draw step.

If you lose control of Seven Star Sword, draw a card from the Lunatic deck.

name: SPELL ASSIST
description_a:
Activate your Spell Card.

You can only activate one Spell Card
per round.
description_b:
Reveal this card, then put it in another player's hand. You may play this at
any time.

name: SPELL ASSIST
description_a:
Activate your Spell Card.

You can only activate one Spell Card
per round.
description_b:
Reveal this card, then put it in another player's hand. You may play this at
any time.

name: SPIRIT CAMERA
description_a:
You may discard a Danmaku
card from your hand to cancel a Danmaku card targeting you.

Once per turn, when you hit another player with an attack, you may draw a card.

name: SUPERNATURAL BORDER
description_a:
When you are attacked, flip the top card of the deck. If it is a Spring or Summer card, you avoid that attack.

You can only have one Defense card in play at a time. Discard one Powerup card whenever you lose life to an attack.

name: TANUKI LEAF
description_a:
When you gain control of this card, recruit an Extra Character.
When you lose control of this card, dismiss that Extra Character.

You gain the Ability and can activate the Spell Card of that Extra Character.

name: UCHIDE'S MALLET
description_a:
When you gain control of this card, recruit an Extra Character.
When you lose control of this card, dismiss that Extra Character.

You gain the Ability and can activate the Spell Card of that Extra Character.

title: The Magic Library
name: VOILE
description_a: Draw three cards, then place a card from your hand on top of the deck.
